Introduction

Jackson Wang (born Wang Ka-Yee) is a Hong Kong singer, rapper, and former national fencer. Before his music career, he represented Hong Kong’s national fencing team, winning two gold medals at the 2011 Asian Junior Olympics in Thailand. He later moved to South Korea to train under JYP Entertainment and debuted as a member of GOT7 in January 2014.

Beyond group activities, Jackson gained international recognition as a singer and TV personality, leveraging his fluency in Korean, Cantonese, English, and Mandarin. In 2017, he founded Team Wang, his own music label, and made his solo debut in August of that year.

Following GOT7’s departure from JYP Entertainment in 2021, Jackson continued his solo career under Team Wang, which manages his global promotions. On January 22, 2021, he confirmed a partnership with Sublime Artist Agency for additional representation.
